AcceptConnectionInvitation.name: AcceptConnectionInvitation
AcceptConnectionInvitation.documentation: Accepts a connection invitation from another partner, establishing a formal partnership connection between the two parties.

AssociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmailDo.name: AssociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmailDomain
AssociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmailDo.documentation: Associates an email domain with AWS training and certification for the partner account, enabling automatic verification of employee certifications.

CancelConnection.name: CancelConnection
CancelConnection.documentation: Cancels an existing connection between partners, terminating the partnership relationship.

CancelConnectionInvitation.name: CancelConnectionInvitation
CancelConnectionInvitation.documentation: Cancels a pending connection invitation before it has been accepted or rejected.

CancelProfileUpdateTask.name: CancelProfileUpdateTask
CancelProfileUpdateTask.documentation: Cancels an in-progress profile update task, stopping any pending changes to the partner profile.

CreateConnectionInvitation.name: CreateConnectionInvitation
CreateConnectionInvitation.documentation: Creates a new connection invitation to establish a partnership with another organization.

CreatePartner.name: CreatePartner
CreatePartner.documentation: Creates a new partner account in the AWS Partner Network with the specified details and configuration.

DisassociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmai.name: DisassociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmailDomain
DisassociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmai.documentation: Removes the association between an email domain and AWS training and certification for the partner account.

GetAllianceLeadContact.name: GetAllianceLeadContact
GetAllianceLeadContact.documentation: Retrieves the alliance lead contact information for a partner account.

GetConnection.name: GetConnection
GetConnection.documentation: Retrieves detailed information about a specific connection between partners.

GetConnectionInvitation.name: GetConnectionInvitation
GetConnectionInvitation.documentation: Retrieves detailed information about a specific connection invitation.

GetConnectionPreferences.name: GetConnectionPreferences
GetConnectionPreferences.documentation: Retrieves the connection preferences for a partner account, including access settings and exclusions.

GetPartner.name: GetPartner
GetPartner.documentation: Retrieves detailed information about a specific partner account.

GetProfileUpdateTask.name: GetProfileUpdateTask
GetProfileUpdateTask.documentation: Retrieves information about a specific profile update task.

GetProfileVisibility.name: GetProfileVisibility
GetProfileVisibility.documentation: Retrieves the visibility settings for a partner profile, determining who can see the profile information.

ListConnectionInvitations.name: ListConnectionInvitations
ListConnectionInvitations.documentation: Lists connection invitations for the partner account, with optional filtering by status, type, and other criteria.

ListConnections.name: ListConnections
ListConnections.documentation: Lists active connections for the partner account, with optional filtering by connection type and participant.

ListPartners.name: ListPartners
ListPartners.documentation: Lists partner accounts in the catalog, providing a summary view of all partners.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.documentation: Lists all tags associated with a specific AWS Partner Central Account resource.

PutAllianceLeadContact.name: PutAllianceLeadContact
PutAllianceLeadContact.documentation: Creates or updates the alliance lead contact information for a partner account.

PutProfileVisibility.name: PutProfileVisibility
PutProfileVisibility.documentation: Sets the visibility level for a partner profile, controlling who can view the profile information.

RejectConnectionInvitation.name: RejectConnectionInvitation
RejectConnectionInvitation.documentation: Rejects a connection invitation from another partner, declining the partnership request.

SendEmailVerificationCode.name: SendEmailVerificationCode
SendEmailVerificationCode.documentation: Sends an email verification code to the specified email address for account verification purposes.

StartProfileUpdateTask.name: StartProfileUpdateTask
StartProfileUpdateTask.documentation: Initiates a profile update task to modify partner profile information asynchronously.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.documentation: Adds or updates tags for a specified AWS Partner Central Account resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.documentation: Removes specified tags from an AWS Partner Central Account resource.

UpdateConnectionPreferences.name: UpdateConnectionPreferences
UpdateConnectionPreferences.documentation: Updates the connection preferences for a partner account, modifying access settings and exclusions.

Catalog.documentation: The catalog identifier where the connection invitation exists.

Identifier.documentation: The unique identifier of the connection invitation to accept.

ClientToken.documentation: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request.

Connection.documentation: The details of the accepted connection between the two partners.

Reason.documentation: The specific reason for the access denial.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: The request was denied due to insufficient permissions. The caller does not have the required permissions to perform this operation.

Name.documentation: The name associated with the AWS account.

FirstName.documentation: The first name of the alliance lead contact person.

LastName.documentation: The last name of the alliance lead contact person.

Email.documentation: The email address of the alliance lead contact person.

BusinessTitle.documentation: The business title or role of the alliance lead contact person.

AllianceLeadContact.documentation: Contains contact information for the primary alliance lead responsible for partnership activities.

Catalog.documentation: The catalog identifier where the connection invitation exists.

Identifier.documentation: The unique identifier of the connection invitation to cancel.

Catalog.documentation: The catalog identifier where the connection invitation was canceled.

Id.documentation: The unique identifier of the canceled connection invitation.

Arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the canceled connection invitation.

ConnectionId.documentation: The identifier of the connection associated with the canceled invitation.

ConnectionType.documentation: The type of connection that was being invited for.

CreatedAt.documentation: The timestamp when the connection invitation was originally created.

UpdatedAt.documentation: The timestamp when the connection invitation was last updated (canceled).

ExpiresAt.documentation: The timestamp when the connection invitation would have expired if not canceled.

OtherParticipantIdentifier.documentation: The identifier of the other participant who was invited to connect.

ParticipantType.documentation: The type of participant (inviter or invitee) in the connection invitation.

Status.documentation: The current status of the connection invitation (canceled).

InvitationMessage.documentation: The message that was included with the original connection invitation.

InviterEmail.documentation: The email address of the person who sent the connection invitation.

InviterName.documentation: The name of the person who sent the connection invitation.

documentation: AWS Partner Central Account service provides APIs for managing partner accounts, connections, and profiles within the AWS Partner Network. This service enables partners to create and manage their partner profiles, establish connections with other partners, and maintain their account information.
